basic_information.scholarship_name: Robert Glenn Rapp Upper Level Music Award

description: This scholarship was established in 2008 by the Robert Glenn Rapp Foundation. Recipient must display a high level of artistry in your area of study. Eligibility Music Major Cumulative GPA 3.0+ Junior, Senior, or Graduate Student Enrolled Full-Time (12+ Hours Undergraduate, 9+ Hours Graduate) Oklahoma Resident Requirements Display High Level of Artistry in Your Area Recipient required to write a brief essay about a class, research, creative or scholarly activity. Personal Artist Statement (250 Words) Official Transcript

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
